APPID.title: OpenWeatherMap API key
APPID.description: You can obtain your own api key by creating OpenWeatherMap account on https://home.openweathermap.org/users/sign_up

q.title: City name such as 'London' or 'Tokyo'.
q.description: You can also add ISO3166 contry code such as London,uk

lat.title: Latitude
lat.description: Latitude and Longitude must be specified together. Otherwise, City name is used.
